metadata.title: CVE-2019-12445 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition 8.4through 11.11. A malicious user could execute JavaScript code on notes byimporting a specially crafted project file. It allows XSS.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
